title: Frankie Essex shows off her incredible figure in a patterned bikini on trip to Bali
text:
She's embarked on a new health and fitness regime which has seen her lose another stone in weight.

And Frankie Essex looked incredibly confident as she topped up her tan in Bali, wearing a stunning patterned bikini.

The 31-year-old showed off her slim tummy in her string two-piece, as she strolled across the beach, before enjoying some downtime on a lounger.

Happy days: Frankie Essex shows off her incredible figure in a patterned bikini on trip to Bali after revealing she's in a new relationship and 'happier than ever'

Her hair was slicked back and in an up-do and she was impeccably groomed, with eyelash extensions.

Frankie recently revealed that she is in a new relationship and is feeling 'happier than ever.'

She said: 'Yes, I'm in a relationship. We've been seeing each other for a few months, and I'm really happy.

She said: 'Yes, I'm in a relationship. We've been seeing each other for a few months, and I'm really happy.

She said: 'Yes, I'm in a relationship. We've been seeing each other for a few months, and I'm really happy'

'He treats me well and is very, very, supportive in every way, we're good together.'

Frankie has dropped two dress sizes and is a slender size 8-10 and she recently spoke to Closer about her fitness.

She said: 'My arms and my legs have toned up and I feel stronger. I've got a flatter tummy and a smaller waist without doing any stomach exercises.

Hard work: Frankie has dropped two dress sizes and is a slender size 8-10 and she recently spoke to Closer about her fitness - pictured in 2015

'It's even tightened the loose skin on my belly. l'll never be a slim girl, and I don't want to be skinny, I've got a bum! Accepting my curves has been good for me.'

Frankie's new lifestyle follows her two stone weight gain which was a result of her not being able to work out due to an injury.

A friend of hers told The Sun: 'Frankie had a terrible year of not being able to exercise due to a knee injury.

'She still can't exercise and is the biggest she has ever been. She's put on 2 stone. It's really getting her down but she has the all clear now and is determined to get back into great shape in 2019.'
description: She's embarked on a new health and fitness regime which has seen her lose another stone in weight.
